At Loanwiser, we are trying to make the home loan application and the process of obtaining a simple and hassle free loan to our every client. Home loan facility can be used to buy a house or flat or resale property ready to shift or under construction
Own your dream house through Home Loan with lower interest rates. Loans starting as low as 8.5% Through Home Loan you can

Choose Plan Amount Standard Custom Plan Customer Benefit Instant Loan Viability & CRIF Report Partner Benefit 40 Credit coins in loanwiser Wallet if the Customer profile is eligible for loan processing Choose Payment Option (Custom Plan cannot be paid using Loanwiser Coins) Send Payment Link to Customer Pay using LoanWiser Credit Coins Pay & Collect Cash Skip Payment & Proceed Note : Any amount of payment made do not assure a guaranteed loan. if you skip this payment for credit Analysis,there will be delay in your loan processing

CRIF Report Activity
Instant Loan Viability Report Fast Track Loan Processing Partner benefit amount \u20B9 200 - instantly credited in your linked bank account Remaining \u20B9 200 will be added to your Loanwiser Wallet as 200 Credit Coins
Plan \u20B9 Payment Method LoanWiser Credit Coins Pay and Collect Cash Current Available Balance - 500 Credit Coins Important Note You\'ll be Charged 100 Credit Coins from your Loanwiser Wallet You\'ll receive 40 Credit Coins in your Loanwiser Wallet as the Partner Benefit if the customer profile is eligible for loan processing Make Payment Back Payment Details Payment Success
Important Note Before you proceed to the next step, you need to have following details: . Customers Pan Card Details . Last 6 Months Bank Statement in PDF Format (Optional)

Please Read Since you chose to skip payment
Viability of loan based on Credit Report and Bank statement will not be done at this stage.
Only preliminary viability assessment based on the data entered will be worked out at this stage.
In the next step, You\'ll need to submit all the required documents based on which the detailed viability assessment will be done. Hence,this will be a slow process compared to instant Viability Report option under our Standard plan, which we highly recommend to fast track your loan processing Proceed Anyway
PROCEED TO NEXT STEP SUBMIT TO LOANWISER
MY LEADS MY EARNINGS
SAVE FOR LATER Are you sure you want to Submit at Step1 if you proceed to step2 and step3 you can receive more payout and chance to earn instant cash benefit. if you submit at this stage.you\'ll only get payout percentage for the Step 1 completion,and only when the loan is disbursed. No, Cancel Yes, Submit Do you have any lead Documents to be uploaded? you can choose and upload the documents you have with you,in the next screen,it will help us in faster loan processing and hence,faster payouts Yes I Have Documents No,Submit without Documents Partner Name
credit report should be at the top of the list of your personal financial habits. A credit report can act as a shining light into your financial background, helping reveal personal payment history and lending and credit worthiness
